revised_title: Investigation of Electrochemical Equivalent of Silver and Respiration in Myriapoda
tldr: The author investigates the electrochemical equivalent of silver and discovers that the true value is probably not far from the previously given value by Lord Rayleigh. Additionally, a new mode of respiration in Myriapoda is observed, and a study on the ginger-beer plant and its organisms is conducted, contributing to the understanding of fermentation yeasts and bacteria.
